attributes.action: Petition to bestow 'athlete, strongman, and budgerigar breeder' Geoff Capes with the honour of Knight Commander of the order of thr British Empire
attributes.additional_details:
For years housewife's favourite Geoff Capes has gone unrewarded for his strongman heroics and his dedication to the wellbeing of budgies.

If Brucey gets a knighthood then surely Geoff deserves one!!
